documentation.title: File Name Standards
documentation.standard:
Ensures that file names meet the following standards: - Filenames should be all lowercase with hyphens separating words. - Class file names should be based on the class name with "class-" prepended. - Files in `wp-includes` containing template tags should end in `-template`.
If `$is_theme` property is set to `true` certain theme specific exceptions are made for underscores.

code.title: Valid: All lowercase with only hyphens as word separators and proper use of prefix/suffix.
Invalid: Use of other punctuation, uppercase, or missing prefix/suffix.
